summary: The test package provides a comprehensive pytest suite that mocks AWS Elastic File System (EFS) services using Moto. It exercises core EFS management features—including file system creation, deletion, description, access point handling, mount target operations, tagging, lifecycle configuration, and CloudFormation template generation—through unit tests that validate expected behavior, error handling, pagination, and parameter validation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of EFS-related code paths in the application, ensuring that file system, access point, mount target, tagging, and lifecycle functionalities behave as intended before deployment to production AWS environments.
